venue.name: Breakheart Reservation/Chris P. Dunne Visitor Center

item.description:
EVENT: A Dog walk, but anyone without a dog is welcome to join us. 1 mile to the lake and 1 mile back.Side trails if there's interest. Legal swimming at lake for humans weather permitting. Bathrooms are at the beginning of trail but no bathroom or changing room at the lake. Bring lunch. This will be a fun walk for a group of dogs and the people who take care of them as well.

Trip's Coordinator: Frances fschuss6@comcast.net
RSVP: To Frances is Preferred, She will try to answer any of your questions and on the day of the event she can be reached by calling: 781-718-8471 if the weather is iffy.
MEET: 11AM at John P. Dunne Center past skating rink. Breakheart is next to Target in Saugus on Lynn Fells Parkway off RT 1. Call or mapquest for more information.
Cost: $5.00 for non-members
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the Event's Coordinator, Frances: fschuss6@comcast.net to make plans

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: MUST LOVE DOGS WALK at BREAKHEART RESERVATION
